lines.text: Mother Nuckells, I'd appreciate it if you didn't untie 'em until after "M*A*S*H" is over.
"M*A*SH"? I won't untie 'em until after "Sunrise Semester".
...and what a culture can't assimilate, it destroys.
Ask Childress if all this was worth his arm.
What? Did you do something to his arm, Peter?
I killed it. With a machine gun.
I killed her. I knew I would, the first time I said "Hello".
He is a boy your age. With powers like yours.
Hester, look at me. I'm proof - proof that my son is alive or else why would Childress be so anxious to put me away?... Well, thank God I'm somewhere.
What do you mean, you won? You did not!
I told you we should have moved to Melrose Park! Harry, this wouldn't be happening if we moved to Melrose Park!

I'd say I'm pretty sound, considering the ravages o' time. For instance, I don't have the use of any more than one of my limbs or vital organs. Good thing the Lord God Jehovah built in so many spare parts.
